org.talend.sdk.component.api.service.schema

Annotation Type DiscoverSchema


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface DiscoverSchema
    Mark a method as retruning the Schema of a dataset. The only configuration parameter will be an Option named "dataset".

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String family 
      String value 

    • Element Detail

      • family

        public abstract String family
        Returns:
        the component family this action belongs to.
        Default:
        ""

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Returns:
        the identifier usable by Structure to reference this action.
        Default:
        "default"
